snippet: Rangers Coach John Tortorella said he did not feel extra pressure to beat Pittsburgh and goalie Henrik Lundqvist will miss another game with an illness.
abstract: Rangers Coach John Tortorella said he did not feel extra pressure to beat Pittsburgh and goalie Henrik Lundqvist will miss another game with an illness.

headline.main: Tortorella Won't Discuss Crosby, Penguins; Lundqvist Still Out
